member.name: T:For
member.summary: Performs a query with specified action, passing in values for requested stream types.

member.name: T:ForU
member.summary: Performs a query with specified action, passing in values for requested stream types, and a uniform value.
member.param: The uniform data to pass to the action.

member.name: T:ForE
member.summary: Performs a query with specified action, passing in an Entity, and values for requested stream types.

member.name: T:ForEU
member.summary: Performs a query with specified action, passing in an Entity, values for requested stream types, and a uniform value.
member.param: The uniform data to pass to the action.
